txt.en: The Rohirrim tower Súth-torr has fallen to the Easterlings and their leaders. The guards of this tower should be defeated.
'Those were no ordinary Easterling guards you killed at that tower; they were the elite guard for the Nazgûl who serves as general in command in this war on the Wold and Rohan.'
The Rohirrim tower Súth-torr has fallen to the Easterlings and their leaders. The guards of this tower should be defeated.
The fallen Rohirrim watch-tower is in the north-east corner of their large encampment of Jóshkhin Orda to the north of North-torr.\n\nYou should defeat the guards of Súth-torr.
Return to Guthferth, Sergeant of North-torr
Sergeant Guthferth is at North-torr just north of Floodwend.\n\nYou should speak with Sergeant Guthferth.
